short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to manage and interact with Excalidraw files, enabling enhanced functionality on the Excalidraw website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Excalidraw File Manager is a lightweight extension that enhances your experience on Excalidraw by allowing you to save, and interact with your .excalidraw files

Key Features[v1.0.3]:
	•	Save .excalidraw files directly from the Excalidraw website.
	•	Delete unwanted .excalidraw files with ease.
	•	Create collections to organize and manage your files efficiently.
	•	Simplify your Excalidraw workflow with better file management tools.
